WorkItem.Description: I've recently, for the first time, attempted to try the new Rawr3 beta. When selecting the "Load Character from Armory" or "Open" and trying to get my character to load I'm not seeing anything. It looks as though it's loading but I just end up with the blank default layout you see when you initially start the application.

Comments.Message: I have the same problem.  I was testing out the new Rawr3 beta and while I can enter my toons information, nothing appears after it is "loaded".  Interesting if supply a wrong server name, the program hangs... so at least it appears as if it trying to contact the wowarmory.  I am on a Mac using Safari.
It would help if you guys would actually tell us what your armory links are...

my armor link is hivershiver @ wildhammmer (us)

http://www.wowarmory.com/character-sheet.xml?r=Wildhammer&n=Hivershiver

My character information is Alcapwnd on the Proudmoore server. I've tried "loading from armory", I've tried loading from the xml file and I've tried loading someone else's xml file all with the exact same results. I can't even equip any gear onto the bank character template that I'm seeing.

can't get any Tichondrius sever characters to upload on version 2.3.2    worked on 2.2.27 i was using before
http://www.wowarmory.com/character-sheet.xml?r=Tichondrius&n=Esttaurmoo

Just noticed something interesting today....

When I loaded a friend of mine's character the status window had 3 tasks (Get Character from Armory, Get Talents from Armory, and Get Items from Armory) and it loaded fine. When I try to load my character however, I only see 2 tasks (Get Character from Armory, and Get Talents from Armory). It's missing the third task to load items from the armory. Weird.
I have only the same two tasks with using Rawr 3.3 beta (same as Alcapwnd reported).  When I use Rawr 2.x (via Mono), I have three tasks that are shown when loading from the Armory.
bumped so this issue doesn't fall by the wayside.
